title: report button for comments on news articles?
body:
dear riot,
Why is there no report button for comment on news articles? 
recently i've noticed a link that has been circulating, redirecting to a facebook video claiming you can get 8250RP for free and requiring users to verify with mobile. Most likely it's some sort of premium mobile subscription. These comments are usually "backed/voted" up by other accounts which are lvl 30 mules with no recent match history and most likely purchased online.

the video has 16k views and supposedly seems legitimate with a guy demonstrating each step saying it works for oce only but his account is  on euw if u check. the chat on the website  it tells you to go is on a loop.

example of this link can be found on the comment section of
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-headed-your-way-limited-time
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-522-notes



**[LINKS REMOVED]**

ps: sorry if there is a section more appropriate to post in

replies.body: Hey thanks for bringing this up I have removed the comments. I will also investigate about the possibility of bringing in a report button on the news posts.
oh just realised i guess we can find the article through http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/the-news-hour and report comment from there :O
Yeah Report feature in news articles would be a good addition.
